bibl.title: Naqlun (Nekloni). The Hermitages, Cemetery and the Keep in the Early 6th Century.
bibl.note: A study on the relations between the eremites and the secular community in the oasis.

bibl.title: Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007

bibl.seg: GODLEWSKI Wlodzimierz, Naqlun (Nekloni). The Hermitages, Cemetery and the Keep in the Early 6th Century.

Sandra LIPPERT and Maren SCHENTULEIT (Edd.), Graeco-Roman Fayum - Texts and Archaeology. Proceedings of the Third International Fayum Symposion, Freudenstadt, May 29 - June 1, 2007 (Wiesbaden, 2008) pp. 101-112, 2 figg., 3 plans, 1 carte.
A study on the relations between the eremites and the secular community in the oasis.
